name: Wheels of Rage: Enter the Scrapstorm
name_original: Wheels of Rage: Enter the Scrapstorm
description:
Put your pedal to the metal in sandstorm valley! Compete for score and renoun as you face the elements alongside your bitter rivals.

Use your abilities to make it through the checkpoints and last as long as you can!

Controls: Press 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 to pick an ability to use.
Hold 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 to shuffle an ability for another one.
Use mouse to aim attack abilities

Made for Ludum Dare 46
